item.title: HPC homework
item.description: For this assignment, submit an Rmarkdown notebook placing the answers below each answer. Additionally, for each problem, you should submit the Rmarkdown notebook you used to prototype the problem, the Rscript you used to run the analysis, and the job script used to submit the job. Problem 1: Monte Carlo warm up (30 pts) Here we want to use Monte Carlo methods to reliably estimate pi to the 5th decimal place using Monte Carlo integration via the integral below.
